channel.title: resume on Ashok Anand B
channel.description: Recent content in resume on Ashok Anand B

item.title: About me
item.description: In the past couple of years I have had extensive experience using technologies like R, Python, SQL, Spark and gained a lot of hands on experience in the domains of data wrangling, data manipulation, modeling, data analytics as well as data visualization using tools such as Tableau and PowerBI. I think I have the skillsets and the fortitude to succeed in this domain. I have a methodical and rational approach to solving problems, I work promptly and diligently so I can stick to deadlines and I pay very close attention to the small details all of which lend well to being a competent analyst.
